Deck Directory

Dragapult ex

Credit: JustInBasil
Copied!
Dragapult is an absurdly good deck now, and will be even better post-rotation!
- Dragapult ex is your main attacker. Place damage counters around the board and take big knockouts with Phantom Dive.
- Dusknoir synergizes great with Dragapult, allowing you to pop a bunch of damage onto an opposing Pokémon.
- Pelipper fills in for Lumineon, allowing you to grab a supporter from deck (or discard!)
- Budew slows the game down a lot. Take advantage of it if you don't get the best setup.
4× Dreepy
4× Drakloak
3× Dragapult ex
2× Duskull
1× Dusclops
2× Dusknoir
2× Wingull
2× Pelipper
1× Budew
1× Fezandipiti ex
4× Arven
2× Iono
1× Boss's Orders
1× Crispin
1× Professor Turo's Scenario
1× Professor's Research
4× Buddy-Buddy Poffin
3× Ultra Ball
2× Counter Catcher
2× Nest Ball
2× Night Stretcher
2× Rare Candy
1× Earthen Vessel
1× Super Rod
1× Tera Orb
1× Rescue Board
1× Sparkling Crystal
1× Technical Machine: Evolution
1× Artazon
3× Basic Fire Energy
3× Basic Psychic Energy
